cells.data:
At a high-level, is the Player Catalog API going to be the recommended way for customers  to get video and playlist information?
*From a player, yes.  The playback API is for the player and SDK; the CMS API is for people who want to sync their in-house back-end systems;
*The playback API is cached; the CMS API is throttled
*All calls from a player should go through the playback API, NOT the CMS API
